sentences.en: A kind of silicate cement highly charged with limestone was developed.
sentences.cn: 研制开发出一种高掺量石灰石硅酸盐水泥.

sentences.en: A white or gray mineral of potassium aluminum silicate , KAlSi 2 O 6.
sentences.cn: 一种绿灰色或黑色的铁和''.'铝'.''的''.'硅酸盐'. ''矿物.

sentences.en: All magma consists basically of a variety of silicate minerals.
sentences.cn: 所有的岩浆基本上都由各种硅酸盐矿物质构成.

sentences.en: Beryl is a beryllium-aluminum silicate, and its color comes from small amounts of chromium.
sentences.cn: 绿宝石其实是一种铍铝硅酸盐，而它的颜色则来自于微量的铬元素。

sentences.en: If the mold spray is sticky, reduce the silicate.
sentences.cn: 如果脱模剂发粘, 则减少硅酸盐.

sentences.en: It's a two - component , solvent - borne , modified zinc silicate shop primer.
sentences.cn: 是一种双组份溶剂基改性硅酸锌车间底漆.

sentences.en: Lead in linear incandescent lamps with silicate coated tubes.
sentences.cn: 第16点:管状白炽灯硅酸盐涂层灯管中的铅.

sentences.en: Note: ADL is the mixture of ADL and silicate.
sentences.cn: 注: ADL实际上为ADL与硅酸盐的混合物.

sentences.en: One question that has baffled planetary scientists is how oceans formed on the surface of terrestrial planets like Earth -- rocky planets made of silicate and metals.
sentences.cn: 一个困扰着行星科学家的问题是：海洋是怎样在像地球这样由硅酸盐和金属组成的石质行星的表面形成的？

sentences.en: Part of the water is used to rinse the silicate from the graduate.
sentences.cn: 一部分水要用来冲洗量杯中的硅酸钠.

sentences.en: Sepiolite is a fibrous natural hydrated magnesium silicate with good absorptive property.
sentences.cn: 海泡石是一种纤维状含水的镁硅酸盐矿石,具有良好的吸附性能.

sentences.en: Silicate Aluminum refractory ( ceramic ) fiber ropes, cloths, strips, packings and sleevings.
sentences.cn: 硅酸铝 ( 陶瓷 ) 耐火纤维编绳 、 布 、 带 、 扭绳、盘根、套管等.

sentences.en: Silicate minerals are characteristically refractory and difficult to break down.
sentences.cn: 硅酸盐矿物的特点是耐熔和难以分离.

sentences.en: The deposit is contained in the predominantly calc - silicate upper part of the corella formation.
sentences.cn: 矿床位于科雷拉岩系上部主要为钙质-硅酸盐类的岩层中.

sentences.en: The most important part of the network is the silicate structure.
sentences.cn: 网络的最重要部分是硅酸盐结构.

sentences.en: There are large amounts of aluminum silicate in the area.
sentences.cn: 这个地区有大量的硅酸铝。

sentences.en: This artist's concept illustrates how silicate crystals like those found in comets can be created by an outburst from a growing star.
sentences.cn: 这幅艺术构想图说明了在彗星中发现的硅酸盐晶体是如何在生长中的恒星的喷发中生成的。

sentences.en: Used for corundum bricks, mullite bricks, silicate bricks masonry in blast furnaces, hot air stoves.
sentences.cn: 用于高炉 、 热风炉砌筑刚玉砖、莫来石砖 、 硅线石砖 、 低蠕变高铝砖.

phrases.tran_cn: 硅酸盐矿物（silicate mineral的复数）

trans.tran_en: one of a group of common solid mineral substances that exist naturally in the Earth
